text:
Richard Douglas James Baker OBE RD (15 June 1925 – 17 November 2018) was an English broadcaster. He was best known as a newsreader for BBC News from 1954 to 1982. He was the first reader of the "BBC Television News" (in voiceover) in 1954.
Baker made cameo appearances in three episodes (30, 33 and 39) of "Monty Python's Flying Circus" and in the 1977 "Morecambe and Wise Christmas Show". He also narrated "Mary, Mungo and Midge" (1969).
Baker died on 18 November 2018, at the John Radcliffe Hospital in Oxford, aged 93.
